name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Americas Footprints - A memoir of your life

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A digital autobiography | online time capsule | create your life story

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the AmericasFootprints.com Web App, you will have immediate access to the only place in the world where you can create a short memoir of your life, storing it as a digital time capsule - FOREVER.  This online autobiography becomes a "Footprint" in America's history that will ultimately define YOUR LEGACY...long after we are gone.

With this app, you can access your digital memoir at anytime, regularly (and privately) updating the information in your autobiography.  Some of the fields you will have the ability to update / add to include your:

-Educational and Career history

-Favorite hobbies (both past and present)

-Memorable life stories (e.g. achievements, successes, milestones, and even hardships)

-Precious documents, photos, and videos that you wish to preserve and pass on

-"Final messages‚Äù to individual family, friends, and even your future relatives

-And SO much more! 


WHY DO I NEED THIS?
Like many others, you have probably lived an amazing life filled with ups and downs, accomplishments, hardships, and unexpected turns. You have made decisions that others do not fully understand.  You have kept secrets that no one else ever knew.  You do your best to get through each and every day, some better than others.  And in the end...these experiences define your life legacy.

However, the inevitable day will come when you are no longer around.  And when it does, the life you have lived, the memories you have collected, and the stories that only you know...will one day be forgotten.  

Don't let that happen.  With this app, you can easily generate a digital time capsule and privately tell your story.  This "Footprint" becomes a tightly-knit, concise summary of your life at that moment, and is a simple autobiography (as told by you) that eventually your family, your friends, and even your great, great, great grandkids can see.

Think of AmericasFootprints.com like an online memoir that tells your story ... the way YOU want to remembered - FOREVER.
